origin.eidolon_origins.lych.name: Lych
power.eidolon_origins.lych/general/fragi: You`re naturally more fragile than normal human being, so you have only 3 hearts.
power.eidolon_origins.lych/general/no_ar: The only thing, that suits you - is warlock's clothes.
power.eidolon_origins.lych/general/aggre: Iron golems are aggressive towards you.
power.eidolon_origins.lych/general/no_tr: You cannot talk to living creatures, and therefore you cannot trade with the villagers.
power.eidolon_origins.lych/general/silve: Because you`re undead, you cannot hold silver items.
power.eidolon_origins.lych/general/ash.d: Enchanted ash is dangerous against you. You cannot step on it, and if you touch it or break it you will burn.
power.eidolon_origins.lych/general/damag: All source of damage do more damage against you, expect for magic.
power.eidolon_origins.lych/general/no_ho: You cannot use any holy items.
eidolon_origins.poor_reputation: You cannot talk with living creatures
